sQuestion: Joan had 695 Pokemon cards , and 6 were torn . Sara bought 133 of Joan 's Pokemon cards . How many Pokemon cards does Joan have now ?
Sally grew 113 turnips and 118 pumpkins . Mary grew 129 turnips . How many turnips did they grow in total ?
Sara has 792 black and 122 red marbles . Fred took 233 of Sara 's black marbles . How many black marbles does Sara now have ?
Joan 's high school played 864 baseball games this year , 128 of the games were played at night . She attended 395 games . How many baseball games did Joan miss ?
There are 112 short trees and 119 tall trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 105 short trees today . How many short trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Sara had 100 pennies and 783 quarters in her bank . Her dad borrowed 271 quarters from Sara . How many quarters does she have now ?
A restaurant made 9 hamburgers and 4 hot dogs to serve during lunch . Only 3 hamburgers were actually served . How many hamburgers were over ?
Melanie picked 7 plums and 4 oranges from the orchard . She gave 3 plums to Sam . How many plums does she have now ?

There are 6 short bushes and 4 tall trees currently in the park . Park workers had to cut down 2 short bushes that were damaged . How many short bushes will the park have when the workers are finished ?
There were a total of 8 football games this year , 4 are played at night . Keith missed 4 of the games . How many football games did Keith go to in total ?
